inlineContent.text: DotDocument provides components for document capture and related functionalities which are easy to integrate into an iOS application.

abstract.text: Configuration options for the document auto capture process.
Represents the type of placeholder used in document auto-capture UI.
Class responsible for the localization of user interface strings.
Static class responsible for generating logs. You can configure log level.
Facing of the camera on the device.
Indicates how the layer displays video frames.
Customization options for the document auto capture user interface.
Validate if Machine Readable Zone is present.
Four detected corners in an image.
Phase of the document auto capture process.
Result of the document detection process.
Mode of MRZ (Machine Readable Zone) validation.
Stateless class which can warp the image perspective and create new image as a result.
Configuration of the document auto capture non-UI component.
Configure thresholds for the quality attributes of the document auto capture result.
Thrown if travel document type resolution, text recognition, or text parsing are unsuccessful.
Representation of closed interval with value type
Stateless class which can detect document in an image.
Stateless class which can read MRZ using image and document detection result.
The data sample captured at specific time which serves as an input for the document auto capture process.
A check digit belonging to a particular Machine Readable Zone element with a checksum in the MRZ.
Stateless class which can analyze image parameters.
The result of using OCR on the MRZ text.
UI component for capturing document images using the placeholder.
Raw image with BGR888 pixel format.
Non-UI component for the document auto capture process.
The result returned from the processing of one image during the document auto capture process.
Class responsible for the initialization of DOT libraries -
Rectangle area defined by the edges with
Representation of closed interval with value type
Presets for the quality attributes thresholds of the document auto capture result.
Raw image with BGRA8888 pixel format.
